author: Zak Cheney-Rice
title: “We’re Going to All Start Dropping”: Rikers Inmates on Being Prisoners of COVID
description: “It’s like The Walking Dead in here.”
content: Modesto didnt know why he was still in jail. Hed been arrested on October 31 and taken to Rikers Island charged with violating the conditions of his parole. Hed committed no crime  New York is not publishing details of his case at the request of his attorney … [+14312 chars]
